title: 06/08/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/08/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, we're joined by media personalities from around sports. NBA on TNT host Adam Lefkoe joins us to recap last night's Bucks/Nets game. Albert Breer of the MMQB explains why Aaron Rodgers missing minicamp should not be a huge concern yet. And NBA on TNT reporter Jared Greenberg explains the thought process behind his question to Kevin Durant after yesterday's game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
